name: good first issue
description: Good for newcomers

name: javascript
description: Pull requests that update Javascript code

name: benchmark
description: Label to run benchmark against PR and main branch

name: semver-major
description: Issue or PR that should land as semver major

name: semver-minor
description: Issue or PR that should land as semver minor

name: bugfix
description: Issue or PR that should land as semver patch

name: bug
description: Confirmed bug

name: chore
description: Small changes or internal project maintenance

name: documentation
description: Improvements or additions to documentation

name: duplicate
description: This issue or PR already exists

name: feature request
description: New feature to be added

name: github actions
description: Github actions related

name: need info
description: More information is needed to resolve this issue

name: missing types
description: PR that does not implement TypeScript changes

name: typescript
description: TypeScript related

name: question
description: General question about the project

name: plugin suggestion
description: Ideas for new plugins

name: discussion
description: Issues or PRs with this label will never stale

name: help wanted
description: Help the community by contributing to this issue

name: wontfix
description: This will not be worked on, the behavior is intended
